Basic.Name: My Sword Zaps Demons
Basic.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to [50|100]% of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy and gains 1 point(s) of Charge.

Basic #2.Name: Brows Be Smitten, Heart Be Bitten
Basic #2.Desc: Initially, deals 3 hits, each causing Imaginary DMG equal to [40|80]% of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy. Whenever dealing the final hit, there is a 60% fixed chance to deal 1 additional hit of DMG, up to a max of 3 additional hit(s). Energy regenerated from using Enhanced Basic ATK does not increase with the number of hits. Enhanced Basic ATK cannot recover Skill Points.

Skill.Name: Master, It's Tea Time!
Skill.Desc: Designates a single ally (excluding this unit) as 'Shifu' and increases 'Shifu''s SPD by [6|10]%. Only the most recent target of March 7th's Skill is considered as 'Shifu.'   Whenever using Basic ATK or dealing 1 hit of Enhanced Basic ATK's DMG, triggers the corresponding effect if 'Shifu' with the specified Path is present on the field:  Erudition, Destruction, The Hunt, Remembrance: Deals Additional DMG (DMG Type based on 'Shifu''s Combat Type) equal to [10|20]% of March 7th's ATK.  Harmony, Nihility, Preservation, Abundance: Increases the Toughness Reduction of this instance of DMG by 100%.

Ultimate.Name: <unbreak>March 7th,</unbreak> <unbreak>the Apex Heroine</unbreak>
Ultimate.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to [144|240]% of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy. Increases the initial Hits Per Action of the next Enhanced Basic ATK by 2 hits and increase the fixed chance of additionally dealing DMG by 20%.

Talent.Name: Master, I've Ascended!
Talent.Desc: After Shifu uses an attack or Ultimate, March 7th gains up to 1 point of Charge each time. Upon reaching 7 or more points of Charge, March 7th immediately takes action and increases the DMG she deals by [40|80]%. Her Basic ATK gets Enhanced, and her Skill cannot be used. After using Enhanced Basic ATK, consumes 7 point(s) of Charge. Charge is capped at 10 points.

Technique.Name: Feast in One Go
Technique.Desc: If March 7th is on the team, she gains 1 point of Charge at the start of the next battle whenever a teammate uses Technique, up to a max of 3 point(s). After using Technique, March 7th regenerates 30 Energy when the next battle starts.

Branch 1.Name: A2
Branch 1.Desc: When the battle starts, March 7th's action advances by 25%.

Branch 2.Name: A4
Branch 2.Desc: March 7th can reduce the Toughness of enemies whose Weakness Type is the same as Shifu's Combat Type. When Breaking Weakness, triggers the Imaginary Weakness Break effect.

Branch 3.Name: A6
Branch 3.Desc: After using Enhanced Basic ATK, increases Shifu's CRIT DMG by 60% and Break Effect by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

1.Desc: When Shifu is on the field, increases March 7th's SPD by 10%.

2.Desc: After 'Shifu' uses Basic ATK or Skill to attack an enemy target, March 7th immediately launches a Follow-up ATK and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 60% of March 7th's ATK to the primary target of this attack. Additionally, triggers the corresponding effect based on 'Shifu''s Path and then gains 1 point(s) of Charge. If there is no primary target available to attack, then she attacks a single random enemy instead. This effect can only trigger once per turn.

3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.Desc: At the start of the turn, regenerates 5 Energy.

5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.Desc: After using Ultimate, increases the CRIT DMG dealt by the next Enhanced Basic ATK by 50%.
